meanings.sent1: I reheated the pizza in the microwave.
meanings.sent2: She reheated the soup on the stove.
meanings.sent3: The reheated pasta tasted better the second time around.
meanings.sent4: The idea was reheated from an old conversation.
meanings.sent5: The reheated bread smelled delicious in the oven.

meanings.sent1: After the game, he reheated his hands by the fire.
meanings.sent2: She reheated her coffee in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat reheated itself by snuggling closer to the heater.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm for the project was reheated by positive feedback.
meanings.sent5: The reheated room felt cozy and inviting.
